query:
UPDATE brandProfiles SET 
  companyName = 'Senti Global',
  industry = 'AI Infrastructure & Intelligence Systems',
  description = 'Senti Global is an advanced AI infrastructure and analytics company that builds next-generation intelligence systems for enterprises and governments. Its technologies combine large-scale data processing, neural computation, and secure automation to help organizations make faster, smarter, and safer decisions.',
  productService = 'AI infrastructure & data intelligence platform

Real-time analytics and predictive modeling

Autonomous decision systems and AI optimization engines

Secure cloud deployment with military-grade encryption

API-based integration with enterprise systems',
  targetAudience = 'Large enterprises, financial institutions, defense and public sector agencies, and technology companies seeking to modernize their infrastructure and leverage AI for mission-critical operations.',
  brandVoice = 'Authoritative, visionary, and technically credible',
  valuePropositions = 'End-to-end AI infrastructure built for enterprise scale

Sub-millisecond data processing and autonomous decisioning

Military-grade encryption and compliance architecture

Seamless deployment across hybrid and multi-cloud environments

Scalable intelligence engine for predictive and prescriptive analytics',
  competitors = 'Palantir Technologies, C3.ai, DataRobot, Databricks',
  marketingGoals = 'Position Senti Global as a trusted global AI infrastructure leader, build credibility through thought leadership and case studies, attract enterprise and government contracts, and establish visibility in AI innovation and security-focused markets.',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE id = 1;
